title: Why You Should Be Careful With Psyllium Husk Fiber Supplement

media:group.media:title: Why You Should Be Careful With Psyllium Husk Fiber Supplement
media:group.media:description:
â€‹@Chubbyemu video about Fiber Supplement: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1MggKIfEld4
@Heme Review Audio-only episode A Grandma Collapsed From Abdominal Pain. This Is What Happened To Her Colon: https://anchor.fm/chubbyemu/episodes/A-Grandma-Collapsed-From-Abdominal-Pain--This-Is-What-Happened-To-Her-Colon-eu9rol

Psyllium husk fiber supplement can be part of a healthy diet, but it must be taken correctly. It has been shown to lower cholesterol levels to an extent, but is best in combination with a proper diet. Always take care to mix psyllium husk with more than enough water. It can become thick and cause problems if it isn't.
